Texts.Chs: 我的朋友^green;瓦格纳^reset;已经很久没有从他的实验室里联系我了，他可能遇到麻烦了。^green;你能去帮我看看到底发生了什么事吗？^reset;我已经把坐标发送到你的^orange;S.A.I.L^reset;里了。
Texts.Eng: I still can't reach them...My friend ^green;Wagner^reset; might be in trouble. The research lab has ^orange;gone dark^white; with no signs of contact for days! ^green;Can you investigate and see what happened^reset; to my friend? You'll find the coordinates ^orange;in your SAIL^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 噢不。瓦格纳...死了？无论如何，我还是得谢谢你...^orange;坏消息至少比杳无音信要好得多^reset;。这是对你的感谢，请带上它然后离开吧。^green;我现在想一个人独处^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Oh no. Wagner is...dead? Thank you...^orange;Sad news is better than no news at all^reset;. Please take this for your efforts, and leave me. ^green;I need to be alone now^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 在^orange;科学前哨站^reset;把^orange;瓦格纳的ID卡^reset;还给^orange;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Return ^orange;Wagner's ID^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
